title: 1984: Selected Letters
description: In 1984, Delany takes a lookback at the historical year Orwell never saw and in doing so faces the heights-and depths-of New York publishing. Through 57 letters and documents from the 1984, Delany offers portraits of millionaire parties, avant-garde artistis, porno-house denizens, modern-day gurus, tax auditors, and the early years of Aids in New York City.
author: Samuel R. Delany
